014package org.jdbi.v3.freemarker;
015
016import java.io.IOException;
017import java.io.StringWriter;
018import java.util.Optional;
019import java.util.function.Function;
020
021import freemarker.template.Template;
022import freemarker.template.TemplateException;
023import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
024import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.StatementContext;
025import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.TemplateEngine;
026
027/**
028 * Rewrites a Freemarker template, using the attributes on the {@link StatementContext} as template parameters.
029 */
030public class FreemarkerEngine implements TemplateEngine.Parsing {
031    @Override
032    public Optional<Function<StatementContext, String>> parse(String sqlTemplate, ConfigRegistry config) {
033        try {
034            Template template = new Template(null, sqlTemplate,
035                    config.get(FreemarkerConfig.class).getFreemarkerConfiguration());
036            return Optional.of(ctx -> {
037                try {
038                    StringWriter writer = new StringWriter();
039                    template.process(ctx.getAttributes(), writer);
040                    return writer.toString();
041                } catch (IOException | TemplateException e) {
042                    throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to render template: " + sqlTemplate, e);
043                }
044            });
045        } catch (IOException e) {
046            throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to process template: " + sqlTemplate, e);
047        }
048    }
049}
